property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for clients to submit jobs. If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn.resourcemanager.hostname.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for ApplicationMasters to talk to Scheduler to obtain resources. If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn-resourcemanager.hostname.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for NodeManagers. If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn-resourcemanager.hostname.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.admin.address
property.description: ResourceManager host:port for administrative commands. If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn-resourcemanager.hostname.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address
property.description: ResourceManager web-ui host:port If set, overrides the hostname set in yarn-resourcemanager.hostname.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.hostname
property.description: ResourceManager host. Single hostname that can be set in place of setting all yarn.resourcemanager*address resources. Results in default ports for ResourceManager components.

property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.class
property.description: ResourceManager scheduler class. CapacityScheduler (recommended), FairScheduler (also recommended), or FifoScheduler

property.name: yarn.scheduler.minimum.allocation.mb
property.description: Minimum limit of memory to allocate to eache container request at the Resource Manager.(In MBs)

property.name: yarn.scheduler.maximum.allocation.mb
property.description: Maximum limit of memory to allocate to eache container request at the Resource Manager.(In MBs)

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb
property.description: Resource i.e available physical memory, in MB, for given NodeManager Defines total available resources on the NodeManager to be made available to running cantainers

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.vmem-pmen-ratio
property.description: Maximum ratio by which virtual memory usage of tasks may exceed physical memory. The virtual memory usage of eache task may exceed its physical memory limit by this ratio. The total amount of virtual memory used by tasks on the NodeManager may exceed its physical memory usage by this ratio.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.local-dirs
property.description: Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where intermediate data is written. Multiple paths help spread disk i/o.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log-dirs
property.description: Comma-separated list of paths on the local filesystem where log are written. Multiple paths help spread disk i/o.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.log.retain-seconds
property.description: Default time (in seconds) to retain log files on the NodeManager Only applicable if log-aggregation is disabled.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir
property.description: HDFS directory where the application logs are moved on application completion. Need to set appropriate permissions. Only applicable if log-aggregation is enabled.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir-suffix
property.description: Suffix appended to the remote log dir. Logs will be aggregated to ${yarn.nodemanager.remote-app-log-dir}/${user}/${thisParam} Only applicable if log-aggregation is enabled.

property.name: yarn.nodemanager.aux-services
property.description: Shuffle service that needs to be set for Map Reduce applications.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds
property.description: How long to keep aggregation logs before deleting them, -1 disables. Be careful, set this too small and you will spam the name node.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation.retain-check-interval-seconds
property.description: Time between checks for aggregated log retention. If set to 0 or a negative value then the value is computed as one- tenth of the aggregated log retention time. Be careful, set this too small and you will spam the name node.

property.name: yarn.acl.enable
property.description: Enable ACLs? Defaults to false.

property.name: yarn.admin.acl
property.description: ACL to set admins on the cluster. ACLs are of for comma-separated-usersspacecomma-separated-groups. Defaults to special value of * which means anyone. Special value of just space means no one has access.

property.name: yarn.log-aggregation-enable
property.description: Configuration to enable or disable log aggregation.
